name: Turning Point (itch) (FriendLight)
description:
Turning Point is 2d shooter with a unique spin - you must time your shots in harmony with continual turning. The game combines fast paced shooting 'n dodging with light puzzle elements. Its free and only takes maybe 20 minutes to play through. What more is there to explain?

"Wow, this game actually slaps" - my friend, unbiased

"Things always feel close, but never unfair" - an actual game designer, maybe also a friend of mine

"The boom felt really good" - my friend, again, but this time translated badly

Controls :

Z / Space - Fire

Arrow Keys / WASD - Move

Music by Patricia Taxxon, used under an attribution license. https://patriciataxxon.bandcamp.com/

Tracks used:

New Plains - Rosa (2020)

Sir Pentagon Listens to Birds - Sir Pentagon (2020)

sd_wasp - The Best Day (2019)
